java.lang.Runnable
public class GlobalClient
extends java.lang.Thread

This class specifies the Client or a Player in a game over the internet. Make sure that you add the INTERNET PERMISSION in you AndroidManifest.xml

Author:
Dominic Bartl / Bartinger
